reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and well-made, with one noting the adorable elbow patches, and they appreciate its comfort and flattering fit. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it roomy while others say it runs big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little short
items.body: Its cute and warm. I love the elbow patches. Comfortable and soft. Its not heavy but I do wish it had pockets. Love the plaid pattern as well. My only issue is it becomes more of a tunic than a dress. So if you're looking for a dress that has more length to it this might not be the one for you. I wear leggings not tights underneath just in case. It may be my body type that makes it but I feel like im pulling it down a lot throughout the day. However I did buy another one in a different pattern. So I must like it Read more
items.author: Stacey N

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice tunic
items.body: This tunic is very pretty. The fabric is very light. Read more
items.author: Ane G

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabric too thin
items.body: This dress is very cute; just as pictured. However, the fabric is so thin it clings to every curve which is not flattering unless one is thin. I'm disappointed in having to return it because otherwise it is cute. Read more
items.author: Jill E.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't like collar
items.body: I just don't like the collar. If there was a way to change it I might keep the dress. Read more
items.author: Sarah T.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Very comfortable dress. I’m 5’2” and weigh 100 pounds. I believe I ordered the small. It was a little roomy but I loved it. Read more
items.author: Aidamelie espaillat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: So cute! Fits great and love the look. Mid-weight is nice as well. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lg stuffy cowl neck, rises in back when bending forward.
items.body: I liked the dress okay but I didnt expext the neck to be a rather large cowl. Was a bit stuffy and stifling. If you’re larger around the middle, make sure you wear this with some heavy tights as it rises up in back when bending forward. Read more
items.author: As I said, the machine itself is good. But your English instructions need to be more clear. Also it is Very important to include the type of expresso grind/brand to buy, included in the advertisement, so people will know what to buy for machine when they order it!

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Mala calidad
items.body: No me gustó la tela venía muy grande Read more
items.author: Adela

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Purplish Red, Dark Grey, Black, Navy Blue, White Black Plaid, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
